opis: Posredujemo pri prodaju luksuzne kuće za odmor u izgradnji. Kuća se nalazi u mirnom mjestu kraj Zadra, također blizu grada Nina, u mjestu Žerava. Moguća je kupoprodaja prije završetka izgradnje s korekcijom cijene, u svrhu personaliziranja rasporeda, inventara, i vanjskih elemenata ( vrt, parking, bazen ). Planirani datum završetka kompletnog projekta je 1.7.2024. Neometan prilaz s glavne ceste. Mogućnost preuzimanja i susjedne parcele uz navedenu. Izgrađena površina kuće je 101 m2. Površina čestice iznosi 521 m2. Kuća se sastoji od: - dvije spavaće sobe, - dvije kupaone s WC-om, - prostranog dnevnog boravka s kuhinjom i blagovaonom, - hodnika, - terase s pogledom, - spremišta. Prilika za investiciju zbog povećane potražnje za ovakvom vrstom odmora, te brzo očekivani povrat uloženih sredstava ! Također prilika za savršenu luksuznu vikendicu neometanu bukom prometnica i predivnom prirodom u neposrednoj blizini, šetnja uz potok s pogledom na cijeli Velebit koji oduzima dah velika je prednost savršenog odmora od užurbane svakodnevnice. Udaljenost: - ZADAR  11 KM - NIN  8 KM - ZRAČNA LUKA  18 KM RE/MAX Commercial Hondlova 2/9 Zagreb Tvoj RE/MAX savjetnik te čeka. Sve informacije dane od agenta smatraju se važećim, no moraju se zasebno procijeniti. We mediate the sale of a luxury vacation home under construction. The house is located in a quiet place near Zadar, also near the town of Nin, in the village of Žerava. It is possible to buy and sell before the end of construction with a price correction, for the purpose of personalizing the layout, inventory, and external elements (garden, parking, swimming pool). The planned completion date of the complete project is July 1, 2024. Unobstructed access from the main road. The possibility of taking over the adjacent plot in addition to the above. The constructed area of the house is 101 m2. The area of the parcel is 521 m2. The house consists of: - two bedrooms, - two bathrooms with toilet, - spacious living room with kitchen and dining room, - corridors, - terraces with a view, - repositories. An opportunity for investment due to the increased demand for this type of vacation, and the expected return of the invested funds! Also an opportunity for a perfect luxury holiday home undisturbed by traffic noise and beautiful nature in the immediate vicinity, a walk along the stream with a breath-taking view of the entire Velebit is a great advantage of a perfect break from the busy everyday life. Distance: - ZADAR 11 KM - NIN 8 KM - AIRPORT 18 KM For any additional information, please contact us at: +385 91 287 9999 +385 1 2304 188 RE/MAX Commercial Hondlova 2/9 Zagreb Your RE/MAX advisor is waiting for you. All information provided by the agent is considered valid, but must be evaluated separately.
Grijanje: Sustav grijanja: Sustav grijanja, klimatizacije i ventilacije
